item.title: 市场研究问卷 - 大约1,250个单词
item.description: 在Proz.com 语言上发布的工作：英语至保加利亚语详细信息：being a project manager with re.trans - research translations, I am currently looking for a professional translator to support us with the translation of a market research questionnaire into Bulgarian.The questionaire is about diisocyanates-containing products like adhesives, sealants, varnishes, coatings, fillers or foams.The wordcount is approx. 1,250，我们需要在周日（3月9日）下午5点之前进行保加利亚语翻译。 CET.As always, we will gladly pay a fair rate, but are expecting (and offering) high quality and professional reliability in turn.If interested and available, please send me a short offer along with your standard rate per word for this kind of translations to: [email removed] (also please feel free to visit our homepage for furher details about re.trans in Berlin ( [url removed] )). 请同样请在您的邮件中包括到您的个人资料的链接。 非常感谢您， igor

item.title: 药品项目所需的意大利至英国MTPE专家
item.description: 在Proz.com上发布的工作 语言：意大利语至英语 亲爱的同事， lingvohouse正在寻找经验丰富的意大利语到英语的机器翻译后编辑（MTPE）专家，以参与医疗 /药品效果（常规工作）。 ideal candidates must have linguistic training or education, at least three years of experience in MTPE, and be cooperative, flexible, and highly skilled in time management.The ideal candidates must have linguistic training/education, at least 3 years’ experience in MTPE, be cooperative, flexible and possess excellent time-management skills.The position is for freelance linguists, interested in on-demand cooperation.Requirements:If you're interested in collaborating with us, please provide the following information:- Your rate per word for MTPE- Your native language- Confirmation of whether you accept PayPal payments within 45 days - Yes/No- A link to your professional profile (e.g., Proz.com or other professional sites)- Smartcat user -是 /否 - 您的CV 请注意：不考虑上述任何详细信息的申请。 />Important Note:Due to the high volume of applications, we regret that we can only contact candidates who are being actively considered for this opportunity.We look forward to hearing from you!Best regards,Sara LyonsPeople Management SpecialistLingvoHouse Translation Services Ltd60 Cannon Street,伦敦，EC4N 6NP，英国电话：+44（0）203 086 94 16 Ext。 004 | [删除URL] |
